column4: Hey guys I Have a question, I want to use Photoshop Cs2 in ubuntu is this possible?
I've heard it's possible in wine, you should look at wine's appdb
I would try with wine first, following appdb's instructions then if you can't get it try vmware
lol yeah, parents didn't get dsl at home until after I graduated from college, I HATED visiting home from college :) Wasn't able to install any linux till freshman year really due to that :-(
